title: 3D Printable Toolbox Label Generator
description:
Python CLI tool that generates 3D printable labels for toolbox drawers. The tool reads an SVG cross-section defining a clip profile, extrudes it to create a 3D label body, and applies recessed text for multi-color printing.

## Inputs
- `cross-section.svg` - vertical cross-section of clip (28.86mm H × 37.7mm D)
- `InterVariable.ttf` - Inter Variable font for label text
- CLI argument - label text string

## Output
- Single STEP file containing:
  - Label body with recessed text cutouts
  - Text insert bodies (one per character) for contrasting color

## Specifications
- Text height: 12mm
- Text recess depth: 0.8mm
- Label width: text width + 20mm (10mm padding each side)
- Front face: longest edge of cross-section (~27.5mm)
- Text centered vertically and horizontally on front face

## CLI Interface
```
python label.py "Label Text" -o output.step
```

## Future Phases
- Multi-line text support
